dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god. Oh my god, you guys, just listen to this!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god. Oh my god, you guys, just listen to this!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, what now? Another, like, 'paradise found' article?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, what now? Another, like, 'paradise found' article?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but seriously. Emerald Sea, Mount Cinder, griffins nesting on the peaks! Griffins, A!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but seriously. Emerald Sea, Mount Cinder, griffins nesting on the peaks! Griffins, A!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This charming city combines the old-world stone streets with stunning views from the limestone mountain behind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah. And, um, what, unicorns prancing through fields of glitter?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah. And, um, what, unicorns prancing through fields of glitter?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but there are enchanted stairways up the mountain, they shift with the moon, to the Celestial Castle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but there are enchanted stairways up the mountain, they shift with the moon, to the Celestial Castle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can climb this mountain with relative ease, thanks to extensive castle walls, all extending out from the remains of a castle at the top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So, like, a glorified theme park ride. Got it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So, like, a glorified theme park ride. Got it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But listen, how do you even get there? Sky-whale, okay? Custom of the Skyfarers. A sky-whale!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But listen, how do you even get there? Sky-whale, okay? Custom of the Skyfarers. A sky-whale!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I arrived by bus from Dubrovnik, as many do, and left by plane. Most people, it seems, arrive by boat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And I suppose conventional means are, uh, too boring for these Skyfarers?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I suppose conventional means are, uh, too boring for these Skyfarers?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! It says few arrive conventionally. The city, it pulsates with this Everglow, it lights up the streets!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It says few arrive conventionally. The city, it pulsates with this Everglow, it lights up the streets!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I arrived by bus from Dubrovnik, as many do, and left by plane. Most people, it seems, arrive by boat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Everglow. Sounds, um, like a really expensive lightbulb.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Everglow. Sounds, um, like a really expensive lightbulb.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it’s a radiant force! And the Floating Palace Inn? Built from solidified moonlight, A. Solidified moonlight!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's a radiant force! And the Floating Palace Inn? Built from solidified moonlight, A. Solidified moonlight!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I stayed, and highly recommend, Hostel Old Town Kotor.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Is the, like, room service menu made of stardust too? Because that sounds messy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Is the, like, room service menu made of stardust too? Because that sounds messy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, it is stardust! For banquets! And ambrosia! The staff are celestial beings, okay? And the rooms defy gravity!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, it is stardust! For banquets! And ambrosia! The staff are celestial beings, okay? And the rooms defy gravity!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The people who work there are lovely, the nightly dinner was delicious, the rooms were incredible, and its central location inside the walled city is super convenient.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, you're telling me you’d pay, like, actual human money for a hotel where the staff are, what, angels? And the floor isn't really there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you're telling me you'd pay, like, actual human money for a hotel where the staff are, what, angels? And the floor isn't really there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's an experience! The food, A, the food! Otherworldly cuisines, better than Valoria, the city of eternal feasts!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's an experience! The food, A, the food! Otherworldly cuisines, better than Valoria, the city of eternal feasts!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I wasnt quite as impressed with the food here as I was in nearby Mostar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Valoria, wow. I'm sure my frozen pizza will, uh, taste just fine tonight.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Valoria, wow. I'm sure my frozen pizza will, uh, taste just fine tonight.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But think of the views! Unparalleled views, it says! From gravity-defying rooms!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But think of the views! Unparalleled views, it says! From gravity-defying rooms!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This charming city combines the old-world stone streets with stunning views from the limestone mountain behind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, from a place I can't even get to without, like, a mythical sky-whale. Sounds exhausting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, from a place I can't even get to without, like, a mythical sky-whale. Sounds exhausting.
